desc: Samus check screw attack or speedbooster affecting environment
label: SamusCheckScrewSpeedAffectingEnvironment
SamusUpdateJumpVelocity
notes: Updates the velocity of samus mid-air (spin breaking, starting to spin, forced movements)

label: SamusTurnAroundArmCannon
notes: Handles arm cannon direction when Samus turns around (except when spinning), shinespark direction selection and samus using an elevator

desc: Samus get X velocity on slope
label: SamusGetXVelocityOnSlope

desc: Call check play low health sound
label: CallCheckPlayLowHealthSound

params.desc: Direction (0xA = right, 0xB = up, 0xC = left, 0x80 = Bomb above Samus flag)

label: SamusFireBeamOrMissile
notes: Checks if Samus is firing a beam or a missile, also handles the charge counter going up

return.desc: New projectile (0 = none, 1 = pistol, 2 = charged pistol)

label: SamusCheckAButtonPressed
notes: Checks if A is pressed and if so sets forced movement flag to 1, used in the standing pose subroutines (morphball, turning around and standing)

label: SamusExecutePoseSubroutine
notes: Executes the subroutine for the current pose, calls Samus check hazard damage, Samus set highlighted weapon, Samus check shinesparking pose, Samus set spinning pose and Samus spawn new projectile

params.desc: 0 if facing right, 1 if facing left

desc: Samus update animation timers and palette
label: SamusUpdateAnimationTimersAndPalette

desc: Samus update draw distance and standing status
label: SamusUpdateDrawDistanceAndStandingStatus

params.desc: 0 if facing right, 1 if facing left

desc: Check vertical collision at position (account for slopes)
label: CheckVerticalCollisionAtPosition_Slopes

desc: Sprite choose random X direction with room slot

desc: Make sprite face away from Samus (direction)
label: MakeSpriteFaceAwayFromSamus_Direction

desc: Check near end of sprite animation (slot)
label: CheckNearEndOfSpriteAnimation_Slot

label: CheckEndOfSubSpriteData2Animation

desc: Check near end of sub-sprite animation with pointer
label: CheckNearEndOfSubSpriteAnimation_Ptr

return.desc: 4 if left of sprite, 8 if right of sprite, 0 if out of range
1 if above sprite, 2 if below sprite, 0 if out of range
3 if in range in front, 0xC if in range behind, 0 if out of range
Super missiles not full at start
Power bombs not full at start

desc: Sprite take damage from Samus contact
label: SpriteTakeDamageFromSamusContact

return.desc: Damage contact type (0 = none, 1 = shinespark, 2 = speedbooster, 3 = screw attack, 4 = pseudo screw)

label: CountSecondarySpritesWithCurrPrimarySlot

desc: Count primary sprites with current sprite's primary slot

desc: Find secondary sprite with part number

params.desc: Death type (0 = normal, 1 = respawning, 2 = already has drop)

return.desc: Sprite on-screen and screen shake is active

desc: Sync current sprite position with sub-sprite position
label: SyncCurrSpritePositionWithSubSpritePosition

params.desc: Splash size (0 = none, 1 = small, 2 = big, 3 = huge)

label: StartMissileTumble_KraidHead

params.desc: File number (0 = in-game, 1 = file A, 2 = file B, 3 = file C)

return.desc: 1 for Mother Brain, 2 for Mecha Ridley, 0 otherwise

desc: Set current particle effect OAM frame pointer
label: SetCurrParticleEffectOamFramePtr
SetTransparencyAndBGEffects
notes: Sets the BLDALPHA for the current room transparency and does some hardware registers magic for the background effects (gradient and dark room)

label: GetBGSizeFlag
notes: Returns the corresponding size flag for the BG control registers

desc: Remove never reform blocks and collected tanks
label: RemoveNeverReformBlocksTanks
SetAutomaticBGMovement
notes: Sets the automatic BG0 and BG3 scrolling depending on the room effect/BG3 scrolling method

label: UpdateDISPCNT
notes: Updates the DISPCNT register value with r1 (used by Kraid at the end of the fight with r1 = 0x400, disables BG2)

desc: Load exploding room during Zebes escape
label: LoadExplodingRoomDuringZebesEscape
UpdateCurrScrolls
notes: Updates the 2 current scrolls, also checks for extended bounds (when taking an elevator and when triggered by a breakable block)

label: ProcessGeneralScrolling
notes: Processes scrolling in general (automatic, slow, scrolls, lock screen)

label: DefaultScroll
notes: Handles the automatic scrolling on a room with no scrolls

label: DefaultScrollY
notes: Handles the automatic Y scrolling on a room with no scrolls

label: DefaultScrollX
notes: Handles the automatic X scrolling on a room with no scrolls

desc: Update room effect and haze position
label: UpdateRoomEffectAndHazePosition

label: SamusApplyScrewSpeedDamageToEnvironment

params.desc: Destructing action (0 = none, 1 = speedbooster, 2 = screw attack, 3 = both)

label: SetRawBG1BlockValue
notes: Does not update tilemap or VRAM

label: CheckSamusTouchingCodeTriggeringClipdata
notes: Checks if Samus is touching transitions, tanks, transparency triggers, or crumble blocks

desc: Check clipdata behavior value changes BLDALPHA
label: CheckClipBehaviorValueChangesBLDALPHA

return.desc: Door behavior (0 = not opening, 1 = opening, 2 = locked)

desc: Set yellow tint for power bomb explosion
label: SetYellowTintForPowerBombExplosion
SetBGHazeEffect
notes: Sets the background haze effect depending on the Haze Data table and the room effect

label: SetupHazeCode
notes: Sets current haze value to r0 and copies a function to RAM depending on the haze value (also sets the haze effect code pointer)

label: ProcessHaze

return.desc: Power bomb ended and room has haze

notes: Calls the haze process code, if a power bomb ended and the room has a haze effect, set background haze effect is called and the function returns 1

label: CheckPlayLightningEffect
notes: Checks if the lightning effect should play, hardcoded to play in Crateria room 5

return.desc: Target door number if found, 0xFF otherwise

params.desc: 0 for checking if opened, 1 for setting source and destination, 2 for setting source
0 if clearing event, 1 if setting event, 2 if toggling event, 3 if checking event

label: EndCutsceneFunctions
notes: Returns one, always used (except for story text cutscenes) as the last function in an array of cutscene subroutine data, marking the end of the cutscene

desc: Check draw in-game time and tanks
label: CheckDrawTimeAndTanks
CheckSustainedInputForScrolling
notes: Checks for sustained input on the map screen, equipment screen, and easy sleep screen

desc: Check update minimap on door transition
label: CheckUpdateMinimapOnDoorTransition

desc: Update corner minimap new square entered
label: UpdateCornerMinimapNewSquareEntered

desc: Set minimap squares with obtained items
label: SetMinimapSquaresWithObtainedItems

desc: Load minimap squares with obtained items

DrawCharacterForText
notes: Draws a character for text (description in equipment screen and story text)

label: DrawCharacterForMessage
notes: Draws a character for a message (item pop up, location name, map screen area name)

return.desc: Line state (0 = No new line, 1 = new line, 2 = message end)
1 if leaving with input, 2 if leaving with "no" option, 0 otherwise
-1 if not activated, 0 if activated, 1 if de-activated

LoadSramData
notes: Loads the SRAM data of the current save file to RAM

label: InitSaveFile
notes: Initializes a new, blank save file

label: CheckSetNewTimeAttackRecord

notes: Checks for events/equipment flags to determine the behavior of a chozo statue
